prompt.text: You are working with a local leader to equip a local unit for an upcoming security mission. Listen to what he say and choose the best response.

native.text: شما میتانین از چیز های که افراد مه ضرورت خواهد داشتن یک لست جور کنین؟

ezread.text: shoma metanen az chez hai ke afrad ma zaroorat khahad dashtan yak lest joor kaneen?

translation.text: Can you create a list of what my men will need?

feedback.text: Work with local leaders, get their perspective. Whenever possible, put your counterparts in the lead.

translation.text: Why don't you outline what you need, and I'll give you input.

feedback.text: Remember to get the perspective of local leaders. Whenever possible, put them in the lead.

translation.text: Sure. I know exactly what your men will need.

feedback.text: Remember to collaborate with your counterparts. Get their perspective, but always support them by working together.

translation.text: It would be better if you made the list yourself.

feedback.text: Remember to collaborate with your counterparts. Get their perspective, but always support them by working together.

translation.text: I would, but I really don't know what they need.
